title: Vigilantes
description: I saved the city. Twice. Honest, I did.Or at least I helped a lot.That should be enough, right?But, oh, no! I still have gang wars to stop, a crazy new drug to deal with, and my only ally is a convicted psycho-killer!And, come on people, now I have to start a new school?If you enjoy high-octane action with powerful villains and a hero who refuses to give up, you will love Ravenâ€™s thrilling adventures in Vigilantes, the third book of Superpower Chronicles. Perfect for fans of Spider-Man and The Teen Titans. Get your copy today!
author: Arthur Mayor
